Html: I'm confused how this buff can lead to a 255 spell damage increase for boomkins?
It can, if you can manage to apply it to the target of your spells. (Not an easy task)
Some trash can be mind controlled. It is possible to apply the amplify magic debuff before releasing the mob. Probably not something you would want to decide gear or rotations around though.
More importantly, it can be used on Tanks during the Patchwerk fight, or any fight that is all physical damage.

TYVM! I finally get an answer to my search. :)
